com.vernalis.pdbconnector
Class ReportFieldModel

java.lang.Object
  com.vernalis.pdbconnector.ReportFieldModel

public class ReportFieldModel
extends java.lang.Object

ReportFieldModel class. A ReportFieldModel defines the Boolean settings model for a single report field.

Constructor Summary
ReportFieldModel(ReportField field)
          Instantiates a new report field model for a given report field.

applyTrigger

public boolean applyTrigger(java.util.List<ReportFieldModel> models)
Applies selection trigger. The selection state of this model is set to true if any of the report field models passed in is a trigger for this field AND is selected.

Parameters:
models - the report field models
Returns:
new selection state

applyStandardReport

public boolean applyStandardReport(StandardReport stdReport)
Applies standard report. Overrides the selection state of this model, if a non-customizable standard report is applied.

Parameters:
stdReport - the standard report to apply
Returns:
new selection state
